duties_responsibilities.duty: Support store operations, including sales forecasting, scheduling, and payroll to achieve effective daily zone chart.
Guide the team to prioritize customer service and styling recommendations to drive metrics and achieve store goals.
Collaborate with key partners for effective execution of shipment processing, restocking, and product placement while maintaining visual and display standards.
Engage employees at all levels to encourage open dialogue, reinforce follow through, and ensure the store team is heard and supported.
Participate in recruiting, hiring, and retaining top talent to build a bench for the store; facilitate thoughtful onboarding for new hires.
Deliver a seamless omni-channel shopping and event experience through the understanding and utilization of MPOS, POS, and customer service applications.

Create selling initiatives that enhance customer experience, encouraging the team to build lasting relationships through personalized service, product recommendations, and connecting with customers in an authentic way.
Participate as the manager-on-duty by driving engagement in each zone through communication, adaptability, and fostering a collaborative selling environment.
Adhere to the store's safety standards, inventory accuracy, reduction of product loss, and uphold all company policies and procedures to support store profitability.
Facilitate the sharing of product knowledge, current trends, visual priorities, and brand messaging through daily meetings with the team.
Protect time with direct reports, set goals, and deliver feedback for team's personal growth.
Share feedback with the Store Manager and provide insight related to the customer experience regarding product and presentation.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Retail Management or Business Administration (preferred)
